title: Eliminate Code Duplication
description: Refactor the repetitive code to follow the DRY principle
starterCode:
# Refactor this repetitive code using DRY principle
def calculate_rectangle_area(length, width):
    return length * width

def calculate_square_area(side):
    return side * side

def calculate_triangle_area(base, height):
    return (base * height) / 2

# Test cases
print(calculate_rectangle_area(5, 10))
print(calculate_square_area(5))
print(calculate_triangle_area(5, 10))
hints: Create a single function that handles all shapes
Use parameters to specify the shape type
